body:
File: interpreter/interpreter-generator.cc
Handlers of interest:
- IGNITION_HANDLER(LdaLookupSlot, InterpreterAssembler) { CallRuntime(Runtime::kLoadLookupSlot, context, name); }
- IGNITION_HANDLER(LdaLookupSlotInsideTypeof, InterpreterAssembler) { CallRuntime(Runtime::kLoadLookupSlotInsideTypeof, context, name); }
- IGNITION_HANDLER(LdaLookupContextSlot, InterpreterLookupContextSlotAssembler)::LookupContextSlot(Runtime::kLoadLookupSlot, ContextKind::kDefault) with context extension fast path via GotoIfHasContextExtensionUpToDepth and LoadContextElement; slow path calls runtime.
- IGNITION_HANDLER(LdaLookupScriptContextSlot, ...): Same but ContextKind::kScriptContext.
- IGNITION_HANDLER(LdaLookupContextSlotInsideTypeof, ...): typeof variant.
- IGNITION_HANDLER(LdaLookupScriptContextSlotInsideTypeof, ...): script/typeof variant.
- IGNITION_HANDLER(LdaLookupGlobalSlot, InterpreterLookupGlobalAssembler)::LookupGlobalSlot(Runtime::kLoadLookupSlot) combines fast path LoadGlobal IC and slow path CallRuntime.
- IGNITION_HANDLER(LdaLookupGlobalSlotInsideTypeof, InterpreterLookupGlobalAssembler): typeof variant.
- IGNITION_HANDLER(StaLookupSlot, InterpreterAssembler): Branch on flags to Runtime::kStoreLookupSlot_{Strict,SloppyHoisting,Sloppy}; sets accumulator to result.
- IGNITION_HANDLER(PushContext, InterpreterAssembler): store old context to operand register; SetContext(accumulator).
- IGNITION_HANDLER(PopContext, InterpreterAssembler): SetContext(LoadRegister(0)).
- IGNITION_HANDLER(CreateWithContext, InterpreterAssembler): CallRuntime(Runtime::kPushWithContext, context, object, scope_info).
- IGNITION_HANDLER(ToObject, InterpreterAssembler): CallBuiltin(Builtin::kToObject, context, accumulator), store to dst register.
Also notes helper assemblers for global/context lookup fast paths that check context extensions.
explanation: Captures Ignition handlers mapping for CreateWithContext, Lda/StaLookupSlot and context/global lookup variants, Push/PopContext, ToObject, including fast-path context extension checks and fallback to runtime.
